_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Code-Server with oauth2-proxy
author: arvati@hotmail.com
description:
Run VS Code on any machine anywhere and access it in the browser.
Download self sign Certificate file from .local/share/oauth2-proxy/server.crt and allow it into your browser to bypass security checks

installation.script:
apt update
apt install -y curl jq openssl
#MATCH=linux-arm64

# Create initial directories
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

# Create needed directories
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.local/lib /mnt/server/.local/share/code-server /mnt/server/.local/share/oauth2-proxy /mnt/server/.local/bin /mnt/server/.config/code-server  /mnt/server/.config/oauth2-proxy /mnt/server/projects /mnt/server/.local/share/logs

# clean old folders from last install
rm -rf /mnt/server/.local/lib/* /mnt/server/.local/lib/.[a-zA-Z0-9]*
rm -rf /mnt/server/.local/bin/* /mnt/server/.local/bin/.[a-zA-Z0-9]*
rm -rf /mnt/server/.local/share/logs/*

# Change permission of projects directory so it can be accessed by code-server
chmod 777 /mnt/server/projects
touch "/mnt/server/projects/PLACE YOUR PROJECTS HERE"

# make certificate
if [ ! -e /mnt/server/.local/share/oauth2-proxy/server.key ] && [ ! -e /mnt/server/.local/share/oauth2-proxy/server.crt ]; then
openssl req -x509 -newkey rsa:4096 -sha256 -days 3650 -nodes -keyout /mnt/server/.local/share/oauth2-proxy/server.key -out /mnt/server/.local/share/oauth2-proxy/server.crt -subj /CN=${HOSTNAME}:${SERVER_PORT} -addext subjectAltName=DNS:${HOSTNAME}:${SERVER_PORT}
fi

# Check for available versions. Defaults to latest if no valid version is found.
LATEST_JSON=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/oauth2-proxy/oauth2-proxy/releases/latest")
RELEASES=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/oauth2-proxy/oauth2-proxy/releases")
if [ -z "${OVERSION}" ] || [ "${OVERSION}" == "latest" ]; then
    DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${LATEST_JSON} | jq .assets | jq -r .[].browser_download_url | grep -i ${MATCH}.tar.gz)
else
    VERSION_CHECK=$(echo ${RELEASES} | jq -r --arg VERSION "v${OVERSION}" '.[] | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .tag_name')
    if [ "v${OVERSION}" == "${VERSION_CHECK}" ]; then
        DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${RELEASES} | jq -r --arg VERSION "v${OVERSION}" '.[] | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .assets[].browser_download_url' | grep -i ${MATCH}.tar.gz)
    else
        echo -e "defaulting to latest release"
        DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${LATEST_JSON} | jq .assets | jq -r .[].browser_download_url | grep -i ${MATCH}.tar.gz)
    fi
fi
# Download the given Version and extract it
echo "Downloading ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"
curl -fL ${DOWNLOAD_URL} | tar -C /mnt/server/.local/lib -xz
mv /mnt/server/.local/lib/oauth2-proxy-*${MATCH} /mnt/server/.local/lib/oauth2-proxy-${VERSION}
ln -sf ../lib/oauth2-proxy-${VERSION}/oauth2-proxy /mnt/server/.local/bin/oauth2-proxy

COOKIE=$(cat /dev/urandom | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' | fold -w 32 | head -n 1)

echo "${EMAILS}" > /mnt/server/.local/share/oauth2-proxy/emails
echo "ssl_upstream_insecure_skip_verify = true
#ssl_insecure_skip_verify = true
#https://github.com/settings/developers
skip_provider_button = true
provider = \"github\"
#client_id = \"\"
#client_secret = \"\"
https_address = \":${SERVER_PORT}\"
http_address = \":${SERVER_PORT}\"
redirect_url = \"https://${HOSTNAME}:${SERVER_PORT}/oauth2/callback\"
authenticated_emails_file = \"/home/container/.local/share/oauth2-proxy/emails\"
tls_cert_file = \"/home/container/.local/share/oauth2-proxy/server.crt\"
tls_key_file = \"/home/container/.local/share/oauth2-proxy/server.key\"
upstreams = [\"https://127.0.0.1:8080/\"]
cookie_secret = \"${COOKIE}\"
cookie_name = \"_oauth2_proxy\"
cookie_expire = \"168h\"
cookie_secure = true
cookie_httponly = true
logging_filename = \"/home/container/.local/share/logs/oauth2-proxy.log\"
logging_max_size = 100
logging_max_age = 7
logging_local_time = true
logging_compress = false
standard_logging = true
standard_logging_format = \"[{{.Timestamp}}] [{{.File}}] {{.Message}}\"
request_logging = true
request_logging_format = \"{{.Client}} - {{.Username}} [{{.Timestamp}}] {{.Host}} {{.RequestMethod}} {{.Upstream}} {{.RequestURI}} {{.Protocol}} {{.UserAgent}} {{.StatusCode}} {{.ResponseSize}} {{.RequestDuration}}\"
auth_logging = true
auth_logging_format = \"{{.Client}} - {{.Username}} [{{.Timestamp}}] [{{.Status}}] {{.Message}}\"
" > /mnt/server/.config/oauth2-proxy/oauth2-proxy.cfg

# Check for available versions. Defaults to latest if no valid version is found.
LATEST_JSON=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/cdr/code-server/releases/latest")
RELEASES=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/cdr/code-server/releases")
if [ -z "${VERSION}" ] || [ "${VERSION}" == "latest" ]; then
    DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${LATEST_JSON} | jq .assets | jq -r .[].browser_download_url | grep -i ${MATCH}.tar.gz)
else
    VERSION_CHECK=$(echo ${RELEASES} | jq -r --arg VERSION "v${VERSION}" '.[] | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .tag_name')
    if [ "v${VERSION}" == "${VERSION_CHECK}" ]; then
        DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${RELEASES} | jq -r --arg VERSION "v${VERSION}" '.[] | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .assets[].browser_download_url' | grep -i ${MATCH}.tar.gz)
    else
        echo -e "defaulting to latest release"
        DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${LATEST_JSON} | jq .assets | jq -r .[].browser_download_url | grep -i ${MATCH}.tar.gz)
    fi
fi
# Download the given Version and extract it
echo "Downloading ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"
curl -fL ${DOWNLOAD_URL} | tar -C /mnt/server/.local/lib -xz
mv /mnt/server/.local/lib/code-server-*${MATCH} /mnt/server/.local/lib/code-server-${VERSION}
ln -sf ../lib/code-server-${VERSION}/bin/code-server /mnt/server/.local/bin/code-server



PATH="/mnt/server/.local/bin:$PATH"

echo "bind-addr: 127.0.0.1:8080
auth: none
cert-host: 127.0.0.1:8080
cert: true
disable-telemetry: true
disable-update-check: true" > /mnt/server/.config/code-server/config.yaml

echo "
setsid /home/container/.local/bin/oauth2-proxy --config /home/container/.config/oauth2-proxy/oauth2-proxy.cfg >/dev/null 2>&1 < /dev/null &
/bin/sh /home/container/.local/bin/code-server
echo \"service started, see log files at .local/share/logs\"" > /mnt/server/.local/bin/start.sh
chmod +x /mnt/server/.local/bin/start.sh

echo "Install complete"

variables.name: Code-Server Version
variables.description: Version for (re)installation such as 3.9.3. Defaults to latest version if no valid version is provided

variables.name: Hostname
variables.description:
Hostname to use with self sign certificate and to access code server
Use this url https://HOSTNAME:PORT afterwards

variables.name: Github ClientID
variables.description:
Create a new OAuth App at https://github.com/settings/developers.
Homepage URL: https://HOSTNAME:PORT
Authorization callback URL: https://HOSTNAME:PORT/oauth2/callback

variables.name: Github Secret
variables.description:
Create a new OAuth App at https://github.com/settings/developers.
Homepage URL: https://HOSTNAME:PORT
Authorization callback URL: https://HOSTNAME:PORT/oauth2/callback

variables.name: Emails
variables.description: List one email per line to be authorized to access your site
